data.name: usage_help
data.value:
T_Usage: automateconfig [options]
Options:
 ? | help | /h : T_Show this help
 connections : T_Shows the database configuration dialog
 This is the default if no option is given
 mksrc {sourcename} : T_Creates an event log source within the
 Blue Prism event log, if it does not
 already exist
 daemon {procid} : T_Starts the automateconfig writer daemon for
 the given process id

data.name: PID0DoesNotRepresentARunningProcess
data.value: T_PID: {0} does not represent a running process

data.name: ErrorInConnectionConfigurationForm0
data.value: T_Error in connection configuration form: T_{0}

data.name: NoUpgradeIsAvailableAtThisTime
data.value: T_No upgrade is available at this time

data.name: ThePasswordThatYouEnteredDoesNotMatchThePasswordEnteredInTheConnectionsDialogAv
data.value: T_The password that you entered does not match the password entered in the 'connections' dialog (available from the main menu).{0}{1}Please check your password and try again.

data.name: TheDatabaseWillBeConfiguredAccordingToTheSettingsYouSupplyBelowOnceSetTheseCann
data.value: T_The database will be configured according to the settings you supply below. T_Once set, these cannot be changed without rebuilding the database.

data.name: FailedToCreateDatabase0
data.value: T_Failed to create database - {0} - see details

data.name: FailedToConfigureDatabase0
data.value: T_Failed to configure database - {0} - see details

data.name: TheNameOfThisConnectionIsNotUniquePleaseChooseAnother
data.value: T_The name of this connection is not unique. T_Please choose another

data.name: PleaseFirstSelectAConnectionToDelete
data.value: T_Please first select a connection to delete.

data.name: YouMayNotDeleteTheLastConnectionHoweverYouMayRenameItAndChangeAllOfItsOtherProp
data.value: T_You may not delete the last connection. T_However you may rename it and change all of its other properties if you wish.

data.name: CouldNotWriteToConfigurationFile0
data.value: T_Could not write to configuration file - {0}

data.name: EnsureThatTheConnectionModeConfiguredOnTheClientMatchesTheConnectionModeConfigu
data.value: T_Ensure that the connection mode configured on the client matches the connection mode configured on the server

data.name: EnsureThatTheSpecifiedServerAddressMatchesTheBindingConfiguredOnTheServer
data.value: T_Ensure that the specified server address matches the binding configured on the server

data.name: VerifyThatTheCertificateOnTheServerHasBeenAppropriatelyConfiguredAndIsValidForT
data.value: T_Verify that the certificate on the server has been appropriately configured and is valid for the specified server address

data.name: EnsureThatTheSelectedConnectionModeMatchesTheConfiguredConnectionModeOnTheServer
data.value: T_Ensure that the selected connection mode matches the configured connection mode on the server

data.name: PleaseFillInAllConnectionDetailsBeforeTestingTheConnection
data.value: T_Please fill in all connection details before testing the connection.

data.name: YouMustEnterAValidConnectionNameTheNameMayNotBeBlank
data.value: T_You must enter a valid connection name. T_The name may not be blank.

data.name: ThisMustMatchTheListeningPortConfiguredOnTheBluePrismServerS
data.value: T_This must match the listening port configured on the Blue Prism Server(s)

data.name: ThisMustMatchTheModeConfiguredOnTheBluePrismServerS
data.value: T_This must match the mode configured on the Blue Prism Server(s)

data.name: UpgradeDatabaseForm_CannotAccessDatabase
data.value: T_Cannot upgrade the database at this time. T_This may be due to another user currently executing a long-running transaction on this database.

data.name: SemiColonSeparatedParametersToAddToTheConnectionString
data.value: T_Semi-colon separated parameters to add to the connection string

data.name: TheTypeOfConnectionToUse
data.value: T_The type of connection to use

data.name: TheHostnameOfTheDatabaseServer
data.value: T_The hostname of the database server

data.name: TheNameOfTheDatabaseToConnectTo
data.value: T_The name of the database to connect to

data.name: TheDatabaseUserNameToUse
data.value: T_The database user name to use

data.name: ThePasswordOfTheUserNamedAbove
data.value: T_The password of the user named above

data.name: TheHostnameOfTheBluePrismServer
data.value: T_The hostname of the Blue Prism Server

data.name: TheNameByWhichThisConnectionWillBeRemembered
data.value: T_The name by which this connection will be remembered

data.name: ThePortOnThisDeviceWhichReceivesCallbackCommunication
data.value: T_The port on this device which receives callback communication

data.name: CouldNotSaveLocalMachineConfiguration0
data.value: T_Could not save local machine configuration: T_{0}

data.name: ControlInRow1MustBeTheCaptionLabelAttemptedToSetTo0
data.value: T_Control in row 1 must be the caption label - attempted to set to: T_{0}

data.name: InvalidColumnRowForCaptionControlCol0Row1
data.value: T_Invalid column/row for caption control: col:{0} row:{1}

data.name: YouCanUseTheWildcardOperatorWhenFilteringByName0ToRepresentAValueThatCouldBeEqu
data.value: T_You can use the wildcard operator (*) when filtering by name,{0}to represent a value that could be equal to anything. T_For{0}example, searching for La* would return all groups with names{0}beginning with La, and searching *Admin* would return all{0}groups containing Admin.

data.name: SelectTheGroupToBeAssignedToThe0Role
data.value: T_Select the group to be assigned to the {0} role

data.name: EnterTheDistinguishedNameDNToSearchFromWhenLeftBlankTheWholeDomainIsSearched
data.value: T_Enter the distinguished name (DN) to search from. T_When left blank the whole domain is searched.

data.name: FilterTextIsNotAValidSID
data.value: T_Filter text is not a valid SID

data.name: AConnectionWasSuccessfullyEstablishedToTheDomain0FromThisDevice1User2
data.value: T_A connection was successfully established to the domain {0} from this device. T_{1}User: T_{2}

data.name: TheGroup0CannotBeFoundInTheDomain12PleaseContactYourActiveDirectoryDomainAdmini
data.value: T_The group {0} cannot be found in the domain {1}.{2}Please contact your Active Directory Domain Administrator.

data.name: TheGroup0CannotBeFoundAsItMayHaveBeenRemovedFromThisDomainPleaseContactYourActi
data.value: T_The group {0} cannot be found as it may have been removed from this domain. T_Please contact your Active Directory Domain Administrator.

data.name: AConnectionCouldNotBeEstablishedToTheDomain0FromThisDevice1User211VerifyThatThe
data.value: T_A connection could not be established to the domain {0} from this device. T_{1}User: T_{2}{1}{1}Verify that the name is valid and that the domain is accessible to this device

data.name: TheCompleteSQLConnectionStringToUse
data.value: T_The complete SQL connection string to use

data.name: DatabaseExistsDoYouWantToOverwrite
data.value: T_The database {0} already exists, are you sure you want to overwrite it?

data.name: FailedToReadSessionLogSizeDetails
data.value: T_Failed to read session log size details. T_Please ensure you enter the correct database credentials

data.name: UpgradeDatabaseForm_DatabaseUpgradeTransactionInProgress
data.value: T_The Database cannot be upgraded until the previous attempt has been completed or rolled back.

data.name: InvalidAdditionalSqlParametersEntered
data.value: T_Please enter valid Additional SQL Connection Parameters, or clear the field.

data.name: CannotOpenOfflineDatabaseHelp
data.value: T_Internal - unable to open offline database help.
